name: v3.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump zig to 0.12.0-dev.2631+3069669bc, ask users to collaborate by @motiejus-wix in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/155
* CI and MacOS fixes by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/156
* MacOS default cache dir: /tmp -> /var/tmp by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/163

## Incompatible changes

Zig cache path in MacOS is now in `/var/tmp/zig-cache` instead of `/tmp/zig-cache`. Thus update your project's `.bazelrc` to make it work for both Linux and MacOS:

```
build --sandbox_add_mount_pair=/tmp
build --sandbox_add_mount_pair=/var/tmp
```

### Windows

Cache path moved to `C:\Temp\zig-cache`. Update your `.bazelrc` to:

```
build --sandbox_add_mount_pair=C:\Temp
```

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/compare/v2.2.1...v3.0.0


## What's New
* zig sdk: bump to 0.12.0-dev.2127+fcc0c5ddc in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/140 and https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/141

Zig upgrade brings in the following changes:
- bump glibc support from 2.34 to 2.38
- fix integration with some glibc symbols:   https://github.com/ziglang/zig/pull/17702
- mitigat `error: AccessDenied`, which, according to Noah Santschi-Cooney, also mitigates/fixes the dreaded `error: FileNotFound` which we sometimes see when setting up Bazel worksace. Relevant commit in Zig: https://github.com/ziglang/zig/commit/6b2709616e22e7651f16293034cc0d25f0e9be0a
- linker: support `--(no-)undefined-version`: https://github.com/ziglang/zig/pull/18486. This will unbreak some Rust users.
- LLVM16 -> LLVM17, which now defaults to `-Wl,--undefined-version`, which can result in failure to link some C code (but easy to mitigate). [Example in zlib](https://github.com/madler/zlib/issues/856) and the [specific workaround](https://github.com/madler/zlib/pull/865).

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/compare/v2.1.3...v2.2.0

body:
## Top level

See https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc1 for changes since v1.0.1. If you are migrating from v1.0.1, this is worth a read.

Changelog since v2.0.0-rc1, which will be not repeated here: https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc2

Since v2.0.0-rc2:
* New command: `@zig_sdk//:tools/zig-wrapper`. It is a "zig" wrapper that sets cache and lib directories, which users are encouraged to use instead of `@zig_sdk//:zig`, which is the plain Zig binary.
* `--strip` is now respected.
* Windows improvements:
  * `bazel build ...` now works on Windows for this repository.
  * add Windows-specific aliases to commands in `@zig_sdk//:tools/*`

## Workspace snippet

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION = "v2.0.0"

http_archive(
    name = "hermetic_cc_toolchain",
    sha256 = "57f03a6c29793e8add7bd64186fc8066d23b5ffd06fe9cc6b0b8c499914d3a65",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/download/{0}/hermetic_cc_toolchain-{0}.tar.gz".format(HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION),
        "https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/download/{0}/hermetic_cc_toolchain-{0}.tar.gz".format(HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION),
    ],
)

load("@hermetic_cc_toolchain//toolchain:defs.bzl", zig_toolchains = "toolchains")

# Plain zig_toolchains() will pick reasonable defaults. See
# toolchain/defs.bzl:toolchains on how to change the Zig SDK version and
# download URL.
zig_toolchains()
------------------------------------------------------------------------
```

## What's Changed from v2.0.0-rc2
* releaser: fix pax artifacts by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/67
* ci test_example with a release tarball by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/66

name: v2.0.0-rc1
body:
## Top level

This is the first Release Candidate for `hermetic_cc_toolchain` v2. Highlights:

1. Name change. It is now `hermetic_cc_toolchain` almost everywhere.
2. The release process has changed; the `http_archive` flag will need to be adjusted. The released archive now skips internal tests, internal rules, and only contains what is necessary to use it by third-party projects.
3. Remove `fcntl64` and `res_*` hacks, as they have been [fixed upstream](https://github.com/ziglang/zig/pull/15101).
4. Add a workaround to a `zig build-exe` [race in zig](https://github.com/ziglang/zig/issues/14815).
5. Remove top-level folder `rules/`.
6. Repository variable for Zig cache directory changed from `BAZEL_ZIG_CC_CACHE_PREFIX` to `HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_CACHE_PREFIX`.
7. Bump to Zig 0.11.0-dev.2619+bd3e248c7, see [unofficial release note summary](https://github.com/marler8997/zig-unofficial-releases#0110-dev2619bd3e248c7-summary). Among other things, it bumps LLVM from 15.0.7 to 16.0.1.
8. License change: roll back to MIT.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```
HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION = "v2.0.0-rc1"

http_archive(
    name = "hermetic_cc_toolchain",
    sha256 = "43a1b398f08109c4f03b9ba2b3914bd43d1fec0425f71b71f802bf3f78cee0c2",
    urls = [
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/download/{0}/hermetic_cc_toolchain-{0}.tar.gz".format(HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION),
        "https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/releases/download/{0}/hermetic_cc_toolchain-{0}.tar.gz".format(HERMETIC_CC_TOOLCHAIN_VERSION),
    ],
)

load("@hermetic_cc_toolchain//toolchain:defs.bzl", zig_toolchains = "toolchains")

zig_toolchains()
```

## Detailed Changes
* More CI by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/3
* remove contrib/ by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/4
* update README by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/5
* go mod tidy by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/7
* all commands: use /tmp/bazel-zig-cc by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/6
* Add the mailing list archive by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/8
* move bin/ to tools/ by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/9
* launcher miscompilation workaround by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/16
* releaser by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/12
* Fixed release URL in readme by @jonathanbaker7 in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/26
* Fixing the url template in readme by @linzhp in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/27
* Make Project Origin more prominent by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/34
* revert "Re-license portions of the code to Apache 2.0" by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/35
* rename to hermetic_cc_toolchain by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/36
* README: fix the download URL by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/37
* remove `@bazel_skylib` dependency by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/32
* Work around a known race in Zig build system by @motiejus in https://github.com/uber/hermetic_cc_toolchain/pull/18
